athnul.name: Athnul
athnul.description: Athnul’s journey from Tian Xia began inauspiciously. She washed up on the shores of Jalmeray three years ago, apparently the sole survivor of a shipwreck. After fnding a home in the Monastery of Untwisting Iron, she progressed through the ranks at a prodigious rate. The masters at the monastery praised Athnul’s pursuit of physical and mental perfection, but expressed a slight nervousness over her unorthodox techniques. Forever stoic, Athnul continues to practice her kata as she makes her way in the world.

rooboo.name: Rooboo
rooboo.description: Rooboo attracts stares wherever she goes. The good folk of Golarion aren’t used to seeing tengus at all, much less a bird-woman in mixed company wielding exotic weaponry. If the attention bothers Rooboo, she doesn’t show it. No one seems to know where such a creature learned the monastic arts, and Rooboo isn’t exactly forthcoming. When you’re a bird that walks around with a pair of sais, you don’t have to answer many questions.

sajan.name: Sajan
sajan.description: Born into a warrior caste in a far-off land, Sajan turned his back on his duties to search for his twin sister, a fellow martial artist taken from their land by a distant lord. Under sentence of death in his homeland for desertion, he obsessively seeks clues that could reunite him with his twin. Sajan has traveled many lands and has been slow to trust the impulsive natives of those realms, but offers his insight and skill to any whom he deems worthy of joining him on his quest.
